title: Xian Wang de Richang Shenghuo 5

synonyms: Xian Wang de Richang Shenghuo 5th Season
The Daily Life of the Immortal King 5th Season
alternative_titles.en: The Daily Life of the Immortal King 5
alternative_titles.ja: 仙王的日常生活 第五季

synopsis:
Wang Ling's family life is turned upside down with the arrival of a little sister, Wang Nuan. Immortal King Wang Ling vows to teach Wang Nuan to control her strength. In doing so, her strength catches the attention of Ye Kui, a sinister organization, and Bai Zhe, a high-level prisoner of the Mysterious Prison. Wang Ling decides to bring Wang Nuan along and teach these villains a lesson!

(Source: Amazon Prime Video)
